name: Treadmill Escape
description:
Treadmill Escape is a very basic 9-to-5 simulation. It is created using Twine 2, with Harlowe 3.2.2.

This game is inspired by Mini Jam #1 - Break Out. It may be many years late, but I'm challenging myself to take on the limitations and themes provided by Mini Jam, and hopefully I can catch up to the current jams and participate.

Theme: Break Out
Limitation: 4 colors or less.
Colors used: White (#FFFFFF), DimGray (#696969), RebeccaPurple (#663399)
